PageInfo.Message:
Through attacks with a bow, in addition to
regular arrows, you can also perform shots with
'Blast Arrows.'
​<PADM> <KC WEAPON_MAIN>Blast Arrow Ready
<KEYM> Aim
Switch stance from bow stance with​ <ICON
MOUSE_WHL_4>​(Switch between Bow shot and Blast
Arrow stance)
(Initial setting) </KEYM>
From Blast Arrow Ready, perform <KC SHOOT> and
shoot Blast Arrows.

Additionally, the power of the shot varies
depending on the distance from the enemy.
<COL ffdc78>When the enemy is captured with the
sniper sight cursor, the distance where the orange
line aligns with the center of the cursor is the
"optimal distance" for shooting.</COL>
By shooting arrows from that distance, you can
inflict the most damage.
